actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A resolution directing the Office of Technology Assessment to study the potential in the United States for rapidly converting from existing energy sources to solar energy.

summary.text: Directs the Office of Technology Assessment to study diverse strategies for rapidly converting to solar energy in the United States. Requires the Office of Technology Assessment to report its findings to Congress within nine months after this Joint Resolution is agreed to.

titles.title: A resolution directing the Office of Technology Assessment to study the potential in the United States for rapidly converting from existing energy sources to solar energy.
